
## Manning's n Channel

```{r mannings-n-channel, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
mnc1 = read_mnc(file1, type1)
mnc2 = read_mnc(file2, type2)
mnc.diff = diff_mnc(mnc1, mnc2)
mnc.rmse.station = rmse_mnc(mnc.diff, "Station")
mnc.rmse.time = rmse_mnc(mnc.diff, "Time")

mnc.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_mnc) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Manning's n Channel Differences at Stations")
mnc.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_mnc) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Manning's n Channel RMSE at Stations")
mnc.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_mnc) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Manning's n Channel RMSE Through Time")
```
